description: Dorchester Penitentiary property in New Brunswick
full_summary:
# Advance Procurement Notice - Health Centre of Excellence

## Project Details

### Project Title
Health Centre of Excellence - Correctional Health Care Facility

### Project Location
Dorchester Penitentiary, Dorchester, New Brunswick

### Project Type
Design and Construction of a new correctional health care facility

### Expected Timeline

* Expected Contract Start Date: July 18, 2025
* Notice Tender Closing Date: August 6, 2024 at 14:00:00

## Background

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is contemplating a procurement process for the design and construction of a new correctional health care facility, a ‘Health Centre of Excellence’, at the Dorchester Penitentiary property in Dorchester, New Brunswick. A Progressive Design-Build Delivery Model (PDB) will be used for this project.

## Vendor Awareness

This Advance Procurement Notice aims to inform industry at an early stage about the upcoming requirement for the design and construction of the new health care facility. The purpose is to guarantee a fair, open, and transparent process and to allow potential suppliers to start preparing for a potential Progressive Design-Build Team (PDBT) to address the various requirements of this prominent project.

## Key Information

* Industry engagement: early involvement is invited from potential suppliers
* No contract or source list creation: this APN does not result in a contract or a source list
* Information usage: may or may not be used in future requests for qualification or proposals
* Costs: the Government of Canada will not reimburse any respondent for expenses incurred

## Contact Information

* Name: Stewart Grant
* Email: stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: Not provided
* Address: None
* Language: French and English

## Additional Information

The solicitation for this project can be found on the official Government of Canada procurement website: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20308587](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20308587)

* Professional engineering services
* Architectural engineering
